summary: Retextures of the nine divine\'s amulets.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2866/9158234286_970af7843e_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2848/9158234422_03a5f644ae_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7289/9153983970_c88806347d_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5538/9153984164_c9ea460fc0_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3702/9151759363_b097dca75e_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7356/9151758847_9a85bb4b0b_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7458/9151759199_2b8035f39f_n.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2822/9153984354_c69072b3b4_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7407/9151760249_4af2e4e371_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3765/9153984982_46ff38af2b_n.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2839/9153984780_9ce5d32d11_n.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2887/9156010023_65327b0a2e_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3719/9158234560_d1b87b20b5_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1]
[center]A complete retexture of the divine Amulets, with [u]the same resolution[/u] as Vanilla ones.[/center]


[center]Now you can download the [u]Optional Files[/u] with other three Amulets retexture, the Gold Versions of the amulets and the Dragonborn DLC\'s Amulets.[/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7368/9158387628_c52bd46e25_o.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3753/9156161685_5ac9acaa45_o.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2866/9156161475_dfcc90bf2c_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5482/9154215362_60279e8c3e_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7367/9151989699_9673aae857_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2873/9154215008_c8e7b069c1_n.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3674/9156162259_3cb76678e0_o.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2866/9156161475_dfcc90bf2c_o.jpg[/img][/center]



[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5452/9151988623_b58d19447b_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3683/9154214574_a677ecd1fb_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2813/9151989215_6e5311b4b8_n.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3809/9156161367_e68cbeeb8f_o.jpg[/img] [img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2866/9156161475_dfcc90bf2c_o.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5494/9152327489_f1608bc5f2_n.jpg[/img][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2827/9152327697_f228abfae5_n.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3738/9208242082_b9fb3f44e6_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]Please leave a comment if you have any suggest, if you like or if you don\'t like something.[/center][/size]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7319/9159422022_43eb8c16dd_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5531/9157438047_2843e1bb5f_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32561][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7338/9166673649_aa0f4829b3.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7418/9161521174_bbda1e7b46_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30173][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3750/9162034418_de96ddaeb8.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5538/9166837837_cfd3fbcf01_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37718][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7334/9162034988_42638232c4.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5469/9168331409_5ac84abb6b_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32182][img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5523/9169624372_cc462c502e.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3676/9159613122_98a9535e37_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=+1][center]Many thanks to \'FantasyStock\' for old silver textures.[/center][/size]
